Topic.Title: Check for death on every page

Posts.EditableText:
Hi!

I'm trying to create a gamebook with an energy attribute.

Is there a way to make Quest check on every page switch if the game.energy = 0? Or do I have to manually copy it to each page?

Posts.EditableText: At the moment you have to copy it to every page. But this seems to be a useful feature (even for textadventures) and I just made some tests with it. Perhaps it will be added in the next version.
